title: Easy Audit System
description: A Laravel-based web platform to manage and monitor 5S audits in manufacturing. It includes real-time logging, role-based access, visual reports, and data export features.

title: Comingsoon Page
description: comingsoon page is a simple, responsive landing page built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript. It features a countdown timer, smooth scroll, and a modern design.
